snippet.title: How to cheat in After Effects
snippet.description: How to cheat in After Effects . \- 2nd ed. / Perkins, Chad Get the most from the most widely used application in the postproduction field! Gain the insider tips you need to compose eye-catching, imaginative Adobe After Effects projects quickly and effectively [...] Hoboken, NJ : Taylor and Francis, 2013. - 384 p.

snippet.title: How to cheat in motion
snippet.description: How to cheat in motion / Sheffield, Patrick Creative solutions without the filler. [...] Oxford : Taylor and Francis, 2013. - 360 p.

snippet.title: EDUCATION AND OUTREACH
snippet.description: EDUCATION AND OUTREACH / D. Barney An estimated audience of a billion people! An incredible statement that summarises the extent to which the discovery of the Higgs-like boson announced on 4 July reached the world. From regional newspapers to worldwide journals and television/radio programmes, news spread fast and wide: this was probably the biggest scientific news item in history. [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2012-057.- 2012 \- Published in : , no. 3/2012, pp. 19

snippet.title: ALICE & LHCb: refinements for the restart ALICE et LHCb : peaufiner le démarrage
snippet.description: ALICE & LHCb: refinements for the restart ALICE et LHCb : peaufiner le démarrage Following the previous issue, the Bulletin continues its series to find out what the six LHC experiments have been up to since last September, and how they are preparing for the restart. Previously we looked at CMS and ATLAS; this issue we will round up the past 10 months of activity at ALICE and LHCb [...] BUL-NA-2009-150; 32/2009; 33/2009; 34/2009.- 2009 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 32/2009 33/2009 34/2009 Fulltext: bul-pho-2009-068 \- JPG; ALICE+LHCb-AerialView-version2_image \- JPG;
